snippet: CARSCH--Ellen M.,nee Adler, October 12, 1923 - April 22, 2016. With Mme. Curie as a role model, Ellen, a pioneering Chemist, Scientist, Quality Engineer, was above all, a wonderful and beloved wife, mother, aunt, grandma, great-grandma, sister and friend. Preceded in death by husband, Harry Carsch; survived by David (Therese), Paul (Ellen), Ruth and their families. Info: recarsch@mzinfo.com 1/3
lead_paragraph: CARSCH--Ellen M.,nee Adler, October 12, 1923 - April 22, 2016. With Mme. Curie as a role model, Ellen, a pioneering Chemist, Scientist, Quality Engineer, was above all, a wonderful and beloved wife, mother, aunt, grandma, great-grandma, sister and friend. Preceded in death by husband, Harry Carsch; survived by David (Therese), Paul (Ellen), Ruth and their families. Info: recarsch@mzinfo.com 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  CARSCH, ELLEN M.
